name: Minigolf VR
description: Minigolf VR is a multiplayer social minigolf game for the HTC Vive, Oculus Rift and Oculus Touch. Play with friends, and experience a social gaming like never before!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GTX 770 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 750 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: NVidia GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 750 MB available space
